Title: Authorizes Matthew Turpening to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer for employment as a full-time police officer for the town of Webb, county of Herkimer
Summary: Authorizes Matthew Turpening to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for employment as a full-time police officer for the town of Webb, county of Herkimer.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Matthew Turpening to take the competitive civil service examination for the position of police officer and be placed on the eligible list for employment as a full-time police officer for the town of Webb
